Package part1.mailServicePack

Class MailBox

java.lang.Object
part1.mailServicePack.MailBox
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, MailBoxInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
MailBoxWithSpam
public class MailBox
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, MailBoxInterface
This class represents the mail account of users. MailBox contains the user and a mailstore. This mailstore implements a MailStore Interface and can be MailStore On File or MailStore In Memory.
See Also:
Serialized Form
